title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in the Preferences Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in the Preferences Workbench.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in the Preferences Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to the Preferences Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Right-click to open the context-sensitive popup menu.
5. Observe that the 'Build' action is still enabled.
